verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He, toy ny tanimboly soa,
Jeso, ny teninao.
'Zay vonona hitady moa
Mahazo mioty ao.
Ny voninkazo manitra
Mamerovero ao,
Hanjary amboara fatratra
Manome aina vao.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Toa kintana mamiratra
Ny teninao Kristy,
Ka he mandefa taratra
Mitsilo 'zany dia.
He sabatra maranitra
'Zay anafihana,
Hambabo ho ao an-danitra
Ny fo manaiky Anao.
